titleStmt.title: SII 7.538: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 538. (A.R. No. 312 of 1901). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
cuṅkantavirtta kulottūṅkacoḻatevar tirumukappaṭi . śvasti śrī . tiripuvanaccakkaravatti konerimmaikoṇṭān ceyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattup puliyūrkoṭṭamāna kulottuṅkacoḻavaḷanāṭṭuc curattūrnāṭṭup pallāpuramāna vānavanmāteviccaturvetimaṅkalattu
Uṭaiyār tiruccuramuṭaiya nāyanār koyil patipāta mulappaṭṭuṭaip pañcācāriyarum tevakanmiyum śrīmākecurakkaṇkāṇiceyvānum koyiṟkaṇakkanuṅ kaṇṭu taṅkaḷ nāyanārkoyil pūcait taṭṭu Uṇṭenṟum tirunāḷ kāṇaveṇumenṟum vāṇarāyar collukai
yil Ikkoṭṭattuk kālvāynāṭṭu munnalūr pirivuṭppaṭa Orupūviḷainilam muppatu veliyum kollainilam patinoruveliyum Āka nilam nāṟpattoruveliyun tevatānamāka Iṭṭu Ūr paḻamper tavirntu tirunīṟṟuccoḻanallūr Enṟu nāmakaraṇam paṇṇi Ūraṭaṅkalum
Iṟaiyili tevatānamāka Iṭṭu vaiykācittirunāḷ tiruveḻuccippaṭikku Ivvūr Āyamum Antarāyattāl kācu nel Uṭpaṭa tevaṟke kuṭuttomenṟu variyilārkkum varippottakañ ceyvārkaḷukkuñ coṉnom tāṅkaḷum Innāḷmutal kaiykoṇṭu kaṭamaiyun taṇṭi
k kuṭimaiyuñ ceyvittukkoḷvate tirumantiraOlai kulottuṅkacoḻamuventa veḷān Eḻuttu yāṇṭu 3 10 9 ḷ 100 7 Ivai toṇṭaimā ṉeḻuttu Ivai vāṇa rāyan Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku munnalūrāna tiruniṟṟuccoḻanallūrkkun tirumukam Iṭṭatu Itu panmākecura rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.538 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
